name: Phoenix Protocol (Zuki)
description:
Made in GameMaker Studio. I started this project in May 2022. Aside from an input manager, all systems were made from scratch, either following tutorials or making my own. This is my first game and I hope it’s enjoyable. 

Special thanks to:

  • Shaun Spalding (Makes lots of tutorials for GameMaker)
  • Artur (Made many tracks for the game. Helped me with my own music https://soundcloud.com/coldf)
  • Various friends and classmates for playtesting the game
